metadata.title: CVE-2021-25743 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: kubectl does not neutralize escape, meta or control sequences contained in the raw data it outputs to a terminal. This includes but is not limited to the unstructured string fields in objects such as Events.

notes.note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
